Posts.Content: Oct 8, 2012 12:42PM - edited Oct 8, 2012 12:44PM by MissAye I know it could be a vitamin deficiency. I drink lots of OJ and eat pretty healthy. I use a mild soap and thats it..because my skin doesnt like aloe vera (which most soaps have) This just started happening..I dont take anything with asprin...I dont even hardly drink soda and never drink coffee!!! It goes away for a day...and then it happens again but  BIGGER and more. And in more areas! My gums have been bleeding...all day....every day for about 7 months now...and I have  been bleeding easy for a while..but now its under my skin, I was not just asking if it was related to breast cancer, but I have been talking to you ladies in this forum. So I was wondering if any of you had ever had it. Period. Breast cancer related or not.

Posts.Content: Oct 9, 2012 04:06PM MissAye wrote: I went to the doctor today and she  has confirmed that it appears there is something going on with my blood. She did a draw and said she will try and find the problem. I am having bleeding under my skin. Increasingly so. She said I may have to go to a hematologist. It would be great to know that lump in my breast is just fatty tissue and  that all my other symptoms can be attributed to an autoimmune disease. It will be interseting if yet another test comes back normal. When I clearly am bleeding under the skin.....

Posts.Content: Oct 4, 2012 09:29PM MissAye wrote: Wow...well we are both so young! My nipple...haha its funny but its not. It is super sensitive and when it kinda ratracts...it lays sideways? Like the top part pulls in upwards so that my nipple is actually facing upwards!! But its not goning "in" its just laying sideways.Nothing was seen on my ultrasound and two different doctors could feel a lump and suggested it was a cyst, but nothing on the ultrasound...My nipple didnt use to do this. So I am a bit leary. In a pickle lol. I live in Idaho. To be on medicaid you have to make less than $307 a month for coverage. I have a pretty good job for the area but No benefits. I've  been seriously thinking about going to the ER to get a breast MRI...but I dont know how I could accomplish that without acting completely crazy... Not knowing sucks. Its easier for me though because even though I am a bit worried nothing was on my Ultrasound.

Posts.Content: Oct 2, 2012 05:44PM MissAye wrote: Im 20. I barely have B breasts....So it was pretty obvious to me when one started getting a thick...swelling painful area. It kinda looks like I have breast implant on the bottom of my breast..Nice...but scary. I'm the only one who is scared. My doctor said she could feel it and sent me for an Ultrasound...Nothing was abnormal. I was given some information on fibrocystic breasts while the U/S technician looked and me and said, maybe you're just a bit hormonal and emotional about this. Okay.....So  my breast is almost a cup size bigger now. My nipple is almost purple...So  dark..and My other one is pink..I just feels so much more firm than my other breast. Which is Probably why it hurts! I'm curious if anyone else had this issue with there nipple...Guess I'll post it as a question..I know you're scared. I understand...All I can say is...Good luck and try not to worry tooo much. Even though itshard...
